mapper.sql: ADDR1, ADDR2, AREACODE, BOOKTOUR, CAT1, CAT2, CAT3, CONTENTID, CONTENTTYPEID, CREATEDTIME, EVENTSTARTDATE, EVENTENDDATE, FIRSTIMAGE, FIRSTIMAGE2, MAPX, MAPY, MLEVEL, MODIFIEDTIME, READCOUNT, SIGUNGUCODE, TEL, TITLE
mapper.select:
SELECT FI_NUM,
FROM FESTIVAL_INFORMATION ORDER BY CAST(READCOUNT AS SIGNED) DESC LIMIT 0,10

SELECT FI_NUM,
FROM FESTIVAL_INFORMATION
AND LEFT(EVENTENDDATE,6) >= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y'),#{fesMonth}) AND CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y'),#{fesMonth}) >= LEFT(EVENTSTARTDATE,6)
AND ADDR1 LIKE CONCAT(#{fesLocal},'%')
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{fesTitle},'%')
AND EVENTENDDATE > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d')
ORDER BY EVENTSTARTDATE ASC

SELECT FI_NUM,
FROM FESTIVAL_INFORMATION
((substring(EVENTENDDATE,5,2) >= #{fesMonth} AND #{fesMonth}>= substring(EVENTSTARTDATE,5,2)) OR (substring(EVENTENDDATE,5,2) >= #{fesMonth} AND LEFT(EVENTENDDATE,4) - LEFT(EVENTSTARTDATE,4) >=1))
AND ADDR1 LIKE CONCAT(#{fesLocal},'%')
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{fesTitle},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') > EVENTENDDATE
ORDER BY EVENTENDDATE DESC

SELECT FI.FI_NUM, FI.ADDR1, FI.ADDR2, FI.CAT1, FI.CAT2, FI.CAT3, FI.CONTENTID, FI.CONTENTTYPEID, FI.EVENTSTARTDATE, FI.EVENTENDDATE, FI.FIRSTIMAGE, FI.FIRSTIMAGE2, FI.MAPX, FI.MAPY, FI.MLEVEL, FI.READCOUNT, FI.SIGUNGUCODE, FI.AREACODE, FI.CREATEDTIME, FI.MODIFIEDTIME, FI.TITLE, FI.TEL, COUNT(LI.LI_NUM) AS LI_LIKE FROM FESTIVAL_INFORMATION AS FI INNER JOIN LIKE_INFO AS LI ON LI.FI_NUM = FI.FI_NUM GROUP BY FI.FI_NUM ORDER BY LI_LIKE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE FESTIVAL_INFORMATION SET ADDR1 = #{addr1}, ADDR2 = #{addr2}, AREACODE = #{areacode}, BOOKTOUR = #{booktour}, CAT1 = #{cat1}, CAT2 = #{cat2}, CAT3 = #{cat3}, CONTENTID = #{contentid}, CONTENTTYPEID = #{contenttypeid}, CREATEDTIME = #{createdtime}, EVENTSTARTDATE = #{eventstartdate}, EVENTENDDATE = #{eventenddate}, FIRSTIMAGE = #{firstimage}, FIRSTIMAGE2 = #{firstimage2}, MAPX = #{mapx}, MAPY = #{mapy}, MLEVEL = #{mlevel}, MODIFIEDTIME = #{modifiedtime}, READCOUNT = #{readcount}, SIGUNGUCODE = #{sigungucode}, TEL = #{tel}, TITLE = #{title} WHERE FI_NUM = #{fiNum}
